title: Strengthening Medical Practice Competencies: Knowledge-Centered Instructional Support and Service Innovation Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of basic educational support processes
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain the core components of the Knowledge-Centered Support (KCS) framework.
Learners can design a teaching support process utilizing an organization’s knowledge management system.
Learners can propose smartphone-based service innovation strategies in digital learning environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
